name: mud-bridge-mcp
description: MCP tools for LLM-to-MUD interaction via bridge server

tools.name: mud_connect
tools.description: Connect to the MUD world as a virtual user

tools.name: mud_execute_command
tools.description: Execute a command in the MUD world

command.description: The MUD command to execute (e.g., 'look', 'north', 'say hello')

tools.name: mud_observe_room
tools.description: Get detailed information about the current room

tools.name: mud_move
tools.description: Move in a specific direction or to a location

direction.description: Direction to move (north, south, east, west, up, down, etc.)

tools.name: mud_say
tools.description: Say something in the current room

tools.name: mud_emote
tools.description: Perform an emote/action in the current room

tools.name: mud_who
tools.description: See who is currently online in the MUD

tools.name: mud_inventory
tools.description: Check what items you are carrying

tools.name: mud_examine
tools.description: Examine an object or person in detail
